metadata.title: CVE-2023-52925 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: don't fail inserts if duplicate has expirednftables selftests fail:run-tests.sh testcases/sets/0044interval_overlap_0Expected: 0-2 . 0-3, got:W: [FAILED]     ./testcases/sets/0044interval_overlap_0: got 1Insertion must ignore duplicate but expired entries.Moreover, there is a strange asymmetry in nft_pipapo_activate:It refetches the current element, whereas the other ->activate callbacks(bitmap, hash, rhash, rbtree) use elem->priv.Same for .remove: other set implementations take elem->priv,nft_pipapo_remove fetches elem->priv, then does a relookup,remove this.I suspect this was the reason for the change that prompted theremoval of the expired check in pipapo_get() in the first place,but skipping exired elements there makes no sense to me, this helperis used for normal get requests, insertions (duplicate check)and deactivate callback.In first two cases expired elements must be skipped.For ->deactivate(), this gets called for DELSETELEM, so itseems to me that expired elements should be skipped as well, i.e.delete request should fail with -ENOENT error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52925` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-generic-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1015-aws - 5.15.0-1015.19~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1007.8~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1006-gcp - 5.15.0-1006.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1034-ibm - 5.15.0-1034.37~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-33-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1
No subscription required
